page.title: 15TURSDALE 2
page.content: An important part of workshop management is carried out by staff of the workshop planning office. The fabrications are the supports made of steel. The welding compartments are made of steel because if people walk past the sparks will hit them and if it hits the workmen in the eyes they will have to go to the medical room. Normally everynew coal face is fitted out with a complete system of face equiptemt including one or more cutter-loaders, a face conveyor, hydraulic roof supports and a stage loader. Many of these items will have been rebuilt in a central workshop. The safety officer has to inspect everything, if everything is alright but if there is one little fault they get it mended.
